title: LoL Refuses to Let Me Log In
body:
Since about 5pm on 12/11/2015 I have been unable to log into the Oceania PVP server. My username and password are authenticated, but it cannot get past the "Logging In" stage.
I have tried:
-Restarting my computer
-Flushing my dns cache
-Clearing the blacklist on my firewall
-Literally everything on the recommendations from Riot
-Uninstalling and re-installing LoL

None of these have worked, and I am completely out of ideas. Please comment if you think of something.

replies.body:
Hey Rasalas, 

As far as getting back into League of Legends, its best you submit a ticket into Riot Support so they can look into this issue for you. Also make sure it's detailed in all the things you have tried already so they can narrow down what needs to happen. Good luck :) 

Riot Support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

Thanks GoldPikaKnight,
I actually already did this, but it said that the response would take a while due to a high amount of requests, so I thought I'd post something here in the meantime to see if this has happened to anyone before and if they knew the fix. It doesn't seem to be a very common problem though...
Thanks for your help anyway mate!

I was having an issue connecting, then I notice one of their trouble shooting suggestions was to check the TLS 1.0 security protocol in advanced settings on Internet Explorer.....however I NEVER use Internet Explorer, but I said what the heck....To my surprise I couldn't even connect to the web with IE (must've been some update to it that changed settings )but TLS 1.0 was already checked. 

Through my great wisdom, I decided to just reset IE to default settings, and well....it worked....

TL/DR;
Reset IE to default settings through advance options menu on Internet Explorer browser, and see if that helps.
